Administer salve to diseased wild hill-goats ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Now that we have a salve for these animals, our important work can begin in earnest.

'It is important that we heal any nearby diseased prey animals. Healing the wild goats in the hills north of Khûtra will ensure that if any predator should eat them, this cycle of death is ended.

'Will you help us?'
'It's important we do not delay. The sooner we heal these animals the sooner the cycle can be broken.
Administer salve to a diseased wild hill-goat
Healed oxen ([placeholder]/5)
'You have our gratitude, and that of the beasts'. Nature works best when we all work together harmoniously. You are a fine example of that.'
Administer salve to a diseased wild hill-goat
